Home My Contacts My Properties Reminders Reminders No reminders! No reminders Never forget a meeting, call or any other task! You will be alerted in time. </font> at ... By signing up you agree to Edit Details Welcome to your Smart Diary.\nAdd and Manage your Leads and Properties. App setup in progress. Add a Contact Add a Property Delete Reminder Deleted + Reminder + Contact + Property Sign in or Register Password +(91) Forgot password? REGISTER Enter Password Please wait while we are logging you in the application. Please wait while we check the status of your phone number. Please wait while we are signing you up. Please wait... Activity Edit property details You can write any notes about this property. Full Name Mobile No. Area of Operation Privacy Policy. Terms of Use and LOGIN Owner List on Housing Full name is required. Area of operation is required. Please enter a valid 10 digit Phone Number. Please enter valid email id. Please enter a password that you can easily remember. Verify Phone Number We have sent a verification code to Verification Code VERIFY Type it below to confirm. RESEND SMS Please enter a valid OTP. Call Scheduled Meeting Please wait while we resend your OTP. HOUSING.COM Leads Agents Owners No Matching Leads Leads with matching requirements will appear here. SHARE PROPERTY SELECT PROPERTIES TO SEND SEND %1$d PROPERTIES Mark Lead as Inactive This lead will no longer be shown as matching for any property. This lead’s requirements will be removed from the network. Deal Closed? Congratulations on successfully closing the deal. You can reactivate this lead anytime later! Proceed Cancel Negotiable Hi %1$s,\n\nThe following properties match your requirement.\n\n%2$sLet me know if you are interested in these, then I would arrange a site visit for the same.%3$s Edit lead requirements SEND 1 PROPERTY Enter Your Mobile No. Create an Account Enter Password Locality Expert Become a Locality Expert at Housing.com now! Want New Leads? make me a locality expert Set Password Please set a new password for your account. Please wait while we send your OTP for resetting your password. Please wait while we verify the provided OTP. OTP not correct. Please check the OTP and resubmit. Enter name of the person or Pick from the list below. SEND THIS PROPERTY TO LEADS Select LEADS Mark Property as Inactive Mark Property as Active Mark Property as Inactive Are you sure you want to deactivate this property? Are you sure you want to deactivate this property? It will be deactivated on Housing.com also. SEND TO 1 LEAD SEND TO %1$d LEADS Choose Packages List Your Property List my property for Amenities Add Properties Contact Info Address Please wait while we update the status of the property on Housing.com. Please wait while we send request for editing the property on Housing.com. CHOOSE A LOCALITY Please wait fetching localities packages. Image Gallery Please specify the name Please specify the email address Please specify a valid email address Please specify the phone number Please specify address SELECT Thank You We will get in touch with you shortly to schedule for data collection You can also call us at 03-333-333-333 Login to manage your properties and leads right from this app! Close
Logged in user Housing Logo Active Properties Inactive Properties Sold out! Coming soon 0:00 am Sorry, you need to post at least %1$d more %2$s properties on Housing.com to purchase locality expert. GO TO MY PROPERTIES Tap on any locality and select your desired packages. Where should we meet you? VIEW ORDER PROCEED TO PAYMENT MAKE ME A LOCALITY EXPERT FOR ... List Property on Housing Everyone looking for properties in your locality will see you first! Notifications Edit Property If you want to change any other information, please mention it here.
Comments Submit Okay Changes Submitted We received the changes. We shall review them and call you for further action. Thank You!
No changes to save Property matching your requirement Remove Payment %1$s Number Last 3 digits printed on the back of the card CVV No. Expiry Year Expiry Month Name on the %1$s Pay Now Your payment is secure You Pay: No Notifications All notifications from Housing.com will appear here. slot status Total: %1$s Update A newer version of Housing for Agents is available. Please update the app in order to continue. Not Available Some of the packages are not available now. We have removed them and updated your order. Lead No Urgent Reminders View All Reminders Set a New Reminder We have received your request. We will get back to you shortly. Please enter valid expiry date Please enter valid CVV Add a Contact right after you talk to them! Access all your business contacts from one place. Add your properties and share with matching leads and agents. Manage Your Contacts Manage Your Properties No More Diary Work Say Goodbye to your diary and excelsheets! Agent Network Connect with 1000s of Agents who have matching properties and leads for you. Lacs of people are looking for properties daily on Housing.com Tap here to share matching properties with this lead. You can mark or unmark a lead as important by tapping this Star. You can mark or unmark an agent as trusted. Please Enter a valid Card Number Please enter the name on the card buy more packages Active Packages Purchased Packages BUY MORE Payment Successful CONGRATULATIONS! You are now a Locality Expert at Housing for the following week(s). PLEASE NOTE: We will redirect you to the bank you have chosen above. Once the bank verifies your NetBanking credentials, we will proceed with your payment. Select a Bank Please select a bank Get more Leads Looking for New Leads Your Order Summary Payment Pending We are processing your payment.\nPlease do not press back button. Payment Failed oops! something went wrong. Your payment was not processed.\nPlease try again. Try Again Logout Want New Leads?\nBecome a Locality Expert. Know more Error There is a problem with network. Please try again later. We are fetching your housing leads and properties, if there are any. You can buy packages once you have properties live on Housing.com Already Shared Remind Select Contact debit card credit card netbanking Start marking Leads / Agents / Owners in your contacts. Agent Owner Add from PhoneBook Get Properties from other Agents Get Leads from other Agents OTHER AGENTS WITH MATCHING PROPERTIES OTHER AGENTS WITH MATCHING LEADS OFF ON Reminder Type Task Choose a time We are taking you to payments page Private This information is visible only to you Edit Contact You do not have any new contacts in your phone book. This contact already exists. Great! You will be able to see agents with matching leads for this property. Also, other agents will be able to see this property information. You will be able to see matching properties shared in your network. Also, other agents will be able to see these requirements. Property address and Owner details will not be shared. Lead\'s name and number will not be shared Don’t show this message again Add New Contact My Contacts New Update Later ADD OWNER INFORMATION SKIP LET\'S GET STARTED Get started by adding contacts to this smart diary now! "Hi %1$s!" Invite other Agents
Add Owner No Properties in the Network right now. Through Broadcast, you can let agents in your contacts know about your lead. No Leads in the Network right now. Through Broadcast, you can let agents in your contacts know about your property. Hi, I have a lead %1$s. Thanks, %2$s
Something went wrong, please try later from agents in the network Invite to Housing for Agents Hey! I have been using \'Housing for Agents\' App and find it very useful for managing my leads and properties.\n Download link: http://goo.gl/Q8XOSp Hi,\n I have a %1$s. Please let me know if you have suitable leads. \n %2$s has Adding your contact. Please Wait Try Housing for Agents %1$d Matching Property %1$d Matching Properties %1$d Matching Lead %1$d Matching Leads Getting this lead, please try again in sometime Please select the locality for this property. Type a message Contact Image Get matching properties by adding requirements Add Requirements Requirements are not added %1$s has 1 new matching lead for your %2$s property for %3$s in %4$s. %1$s has 1 new matching property for your lead %2$s. Share properties instantly with your leads Get more business from other agents Enjoy seamless communication with everyone View more View less Private Information Requirements Looking for Budget Localities BHK Broadcast BROADCAST REQUIREMENTS BROADCAST PROPERTY More agents here = More business! data security Interested Getting this property, please try again in sometime Feedback Help us improve this app by giving your valuable feedback. Thank You! We received your feedback.\nWe will get back to you shortly. Please enter feedback before submitting. Backup Data Restore Data Backup and Restore Please enter requirements before broadcasting. SEND PROPERTIES TO %1$s No messaging application to process this request BACKUP NOW AND EMAIL Your data is saved on your phone automatically every day.\n\nEmail the backup file regularly to yourself to avoid loss of data in case you change your phone or your phone is lost or crashed You do not have Gmail application installed on your device. Please access gmail on browser to download the backup file Search for Backup on my Phone Restore Data from Gmail You can restore your data from a previously saved backup file on your phone or Gmail. There is a backup file on your phone created on %s. Do you want to restore data from this file? To restore data from a Backup file in your Gmail, open Gmail and search for \"database.agentappbkp\". Tap on the attachment to restore your data. Restore Open Gmail Sorry, no backup file found on your phone Restored successfully Search for a contact... Settings
